titleStmt.title: To the honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses, now assembled in Parliament. The humble propositions of William Ball, alias Bennet, Gent. Concerning the forts of this kingdome. With some other considerations of state.
titleStmt.author: Ball, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Barnard Alsop for Thomas Bayly, dwelling in the Middle-Row in Holborne, neere unto Staple-Inne,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition lacking names in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
